question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. man in striped t-shirt
B. man on the right
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in the striped shirt is in the foreground, actively drinking, while the man on the right is seated further back at the table, with more space between him and the camera, making his position clearly further away in 3D space.
